Congratulations once more on your emergence at the advanced level. This level depends much on how effective your intermediate level was. You can still go back and do that or you proceed. At this level, we shall teach you how to count from one thousand to one million

As we began learning how to count, we started from one to hundred. After hundred, we have one hundred and one (101), one hundred and two(102) to one hundred and ninety-nind(199), then the next number, "one hundred and one hundred" as it supposed to be read but read as two hundred(200). *if the naming sequence continues then we have 201, 202 to 299 then 300. Then 301, 302, to 399 then 400. Thesame with 500, 600, 700, 800 and then 899, 900. then 901, 902, to 999 then we have 1000. Just as we have observed earlier.

I hope you found your last lesson interesting. Obviously, it is difficult to teach counting, especially counting from 1000 to 1,000,000 without being physically present with the learner. If the last lesson was not adequate, you can download our app on Advanced counting to help you. We have some video clips to help you and others to make advanced counting pleasurable. Moreover, the remaining part of program 1 can still fortify your counting skill. The continue button will take you to another lesson where we shall begin to teach you how to write numbers correctly, but we advise that you press the previous button and repeat the lesson.

In this lesson, you will learn how to write numbers correctly and in the most acceptable order. You may ask, "Is this different from our previous lessons?" Yes, it is. One may know how to count numbers but does not know how to write them correctly. Though in our previous lessons, in the course of learning how to count, you must have seen how the numbers were written. But that will only help to make this lesson pretty easier for you. From experience, until the learner writes these numbers repeatedly, you may soon forget how the number structure look like and over time forget how to count.

In learning how to write from one to a million, we shall take you through some steps. In this lesson, you may need an external coach to help you or go back to prevous lessons and copy from the referred pages.
Step 1: Without skipping any number, write from 1 to 100 following the format in lesson ___(Note: The \'tens\' must be at the rightmost column).
